titles.title: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Thirteenth Congressional District of Florida.

action.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-528, by Mr. Brady (PA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 190.

action.text: ORDER OF BUSINESS - Mr. Gonzalez asked unanimous consent that it be in order immediately in the House to consider H.Res. 989; that the resolution be considered as read; that debate shall continue for not to exceed ten minutes equally divided and controlled; that the previous question shall be considered as ordered to adoption without any intervening motion. Agreed to without objection.
Consideration initiated pursuant to a previous order.
Considered pursuant to a previous order.
DEBATE - Pursuant to a previous special order, the House proceeded with ten minutes of debate on H. Res. 989.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/25/2008--Passed House without amendment. Dismisses the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Thirteenth Congressional District of Florida.
